docs.snippet: Under the heaviest trading for a Saturday since Oct. 23, 1937, and two decided waves of selling, bond prices broke yesterday and final quotations were pared as much as 6 points among the leading issues. Sales on the Stock Exchange aggregated...
docs.lead_paragraph: Under the heaviest trading for a Saturday since Oct. 23, 1937, and two decided waves of selling, bond prices broke yesterday and final quotations were pared as much as 6 points among the leading issues. Sales on the Stock Exchange aggregated $6,632,500 against $5,557,000 on the preceding Saturday.

headline.main: BOND PRICES DROP WITH HEAVY SALES; Total Transactions Are the Largest Since Oct. 23, 1937, With All Groups Off
